. @CNORichardson to maintain maritime superiority have to learn faster-must adopt latest info on how human mind works #sas16
. @CNORichardson not everything new requires high end tech...just as effective to employ new way of combining existing tech #sas16
Industry hands shoot up in response to question from @CNORichardson on “who wants to move faster” ...”challenge us” #sas16
. @CNORichardson need to talk leader2 w/ industry-learn from each other...start convo & tap creativity earlier #sas16
. @CNORichardson as tech & info grow at record rates-partnerships become more significant--share in a significant way #sas16
. @CNORichardson we are a maritime nation...90% of our trade flows by water...30% through the SCS...demands our attention #sas16
. @CNORichardson SCS success in 30 yrs...continued prosperity w/o conflict...nations compete but aside by rules and norms #sas16
. @CNORichardson @USNavy partnerships include industry, academia, partners and allies & joint services...just to name a few #sas16
. @USNavy a node in larger network - @CNORichardson network of partners will continue to grow to meet today’s challenges #sas16
. @CNORichardson maritime domain is changing, quadrupled in last 25yrs...along with growth in information and technology #sas16
. @CNORichardson as world becomes more globalize, tremendous opportunity for us to come together and solve problems #sas16

. @CNORichardson to HASC: NSDF elevates ORP to a national level discussion...makes plan more predictable and cost efficient
. @CNORichardson reiterates to HASC a force structure review is underway...considering new threats & challenges...out by year’s end
. @CNORichardson to HASC 8-10 mo deployments to meet demand stresses people & ship maintenance...exacerbated by sequestration

This is horrible MT @GBDchixndonuts: Today is our last day here at GBD
. @CNORichardson tells HASC: BMD ships are our most stressed...considering BMD across entire “kill chain” to ensure correct approach
. @CNORichardson to HASC: triad & Navy’s “ORP” are critical to national survival...working w/ Brits on their at sea nuclear deterrence
. @CNORichardson to #SASC on SCS--will con’t to sail, fly, operate wherever int’l law allows...& challenge excessive claims worldwide

. @CNORichardson to SASC changing security environment has caused us to redo our force structure review...complete later this year
. @CNORichardson MACO to be acquisition speed lane...Stingray will be 1st in line ...over time move more &more programs to speed lane
. @CNORichardson on FY17 budget: Forced tough choices, but proposal allows @USNavy to face its challenges and seize opportunities
. @CNORichardson on FY17 budget: investing in shipbuilding - 1st w/ Ohio subs replacement plan & by ingraining info warfare into ships
. @CNORichardson SASC testimony: Most important part of @USNavy is its peopl - everything starts and ends w/ Sailors Civilians &families
. @CNORichardson SASC testimony: @USNavy mission clear and constant - protect America/Allies, advance prosperity and deter enemies
. @CNORichardson to SASC for first time in 25 years, U.S. faces return to Great Power competition
